The news discusses the concept of Ethereum restaking, which involves reusing staked ETH tokens to secure other protocols. The Why aspect of the news focuses on the reasons behind this concept, including:

1. Amplifying trust: Proponents of restaking believe it can be used to amplify trust across networks by leveraging the trust generated by Ethereum's validators.
2. Economic incentives: Restaking offers additional rewards for validators, which can be used to offset the risks associated with staking.
